墐字的基本解释

墐
jìn
用泥涂塞：“塞向墐户。”
沟上的路。
掩埋：“行有死人，尚或墐之。”

墐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》渠遴切，去震，羣。］
(1)用泥土涂塞。
(2)沟上的路。
(3)通“殣”。掩埋。
[②]［qín］
［《廣韻》巨巾切，平真，羣。］
粘土。参见“墐2泥”。

墐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墐； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页238第08
同堇。見堇字註。　又【廣韻】渠遴切【集韻】【韻會】渠吝切【正韻】具吝切，?音覲。塗也。【詩·豳風】塞向墐戸。【禮·月令】季秋，蟄蟲咸俯，在內皆墐其戸。　又瘞薶。【詩·小雅】行有死人，尚或墐之。　又溝上道也。【周語】陸阜陵墐。

Basic explanation of words
bury
jìn
Smear the plug with mud: "Push to the householder."
The road on the ditch.
Bury: "There are dead people in the line, but they are still dead."

[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Qu Linqie, Quzhen, Qun. ]

(2) The road on the ditch.
(3) Through "death". Buried.

clay. See "墐2 Mud".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　墐; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 238 08
Same as pansy. See the note for the word 堇.　 [Guang Yun] Qu Linqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qu Jingqie [Zheng Yun] has a stingy,? Tu also. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Screw towards the servants. 【Rituals·Monthly Order】In the autumn season, sting insects are salty, and they are all inhabited.　It's embarrassing again. [Poetry·Xiaoya] There are dead people in the line, and they are still or shackled.　Go on the road again. [Zhou Yu] Lu Fuling.
